mapper.sql: id, siteId, equipId, cardId, imagePath, slotType, slotx, sloty, bestCardName, number, masterCardAddress, snmpName

siteId,
equipId,
cardId,

mapper.update:
update slot_inst
siteId = #{siteid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
equipId = #{equipid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cardId = #{cardid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
imagePath = #{imagepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
slotType = #{slottype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
slotx = #{slotx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sloty = #{sloty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bestCardName = #{bestcardname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
masterCardAddress = #{mastercardaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
snmpName = #{snmpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update slot_inst set siteId = #{siteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, equipId = #{equipid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cardId = #{cardid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imagePath = #{imagepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slotType = #{slottype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slotx = #{slotx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sloty = #{sloty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bestCardName = #{bestcardname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, masterCardAddress = #{mastercardaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, snmpName = #{snmpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update slot_inst set siteId=#{slotInst.siteId},equipId=#{slotInst.equipId},cardId=#{slotInst.cardId},imagePath=#{slotInst.imagePath}, slotType=#{slotInst.slotType},slotx=#{slotInst.slotx} ,sloty=#{slotInst.sloty} , bestCardName=#{slotInst.bestCardName} , number=#{slotInst.number},masterCardAddress=#{slotInst.masterCardAddress}, snmpName=#{slotInst.snmpName} where id=#{slotInst.id}
mapper.select: select c.siteId,s2.CellId, s1.number,s1.masterCardAddress, c.cardName from Slot_inst s1, Card_inst c, Site_inst s2 where s1.cardId = c.id and c.siteId = s2.site_inst_id
select * from slot_inst s where s.cardid=(select p.cardId FROM port_inst p where p.portid=#{0})
select number from slot_inst where siteId=#{siteId} and id=#{slotId}
mapper.update: update slot_inst set masterCardAddress=#{masterCardAddress} where id=#{id}
